channel.title: CVE Feed for magazine3 -- PWA for WP & AMP
channel.description: The latest CVEs for magazine3 -- PWA for WP & AMP

item.title: CVE-2021-4354|2024-08-03T17:23:10.712Z -- magazine3 -- pwa%20for%20wp%20%26%20amp
item.description: The PWA for WP & AMP for WordPress is vulnerable to arbitrary file uploads due to missing file type validation in the pwaforwp_splashscreen_uploader function in versions up to, and including, 1.7.32. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers to upload arbitrary files on the affected sites server which may make remote code execution possible.

item.title: CVE-2021-4366|2024-08-03T17:23:10.746Z -- magazine3 -- pwa%20for%20wp%20%26%20amp
item.description: The PWA for WP & AMP plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to authorization bypass due to a missing capability check on the pwaforwp_update_features_options function in versions up to, and including, 1.7.32. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers to change the otherwise restricted settings within the plugin.
